  • public class SentenceList
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Katja KÃ¶nig (conjunction normalization) An instance of SentenceList contains a LinkedList of SentenceObj and represents a text corpus.

      • getSentenceList

        public java.util.LinkedList<SentenceObj> getSentenceList()

      • rawToSentenceList

        public void rawToSentenceList(java.lang.String filename)
        Read in a raw text file and split file into SentenceObjs at line breaks.
        Parameters:
        filename - A String of the raw text file's path.

      • readDependencyParse

        public void readDependencyParse(java.lang.String filename)
        Read in a ParZu dependency parse file. Save the following information for all WordObjs of a SentenceObj: - part of speech tag - lemma - label of incoming dependency edge - index of the head of the incoming dependency edge. Given this information, a DependencyGraph can be constructed for each sentence.
        Parameters:
        filename - A String of the dependency parse file's path which will be read in.

      • normalizeDependencyGraphs

        public void normalizeDependencyGraphs()
        Normalize all DependencyGraph objects. This involves the following steps: - general normalization - normalization for active and passive voice - normalization of conjunctions

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
